divs: Sighting DetailsDriving north from Victorville, CA. At 7:30pm me and my wife witnessed 24 red lights in the distance near Dale Evans exit, then drifted slowly over the I-15 and went behind a mountain and dissappeared. Also lights went slowly from red to white. When I first saw it I thought it was helicopters flying in formation at least five to 8 miles away, but when it got closer it was massive and moved silently and slowly. I was in utter disbelief. I still don't know what it was.
Summary: Possibly saucer like, very black, 4 red lights, at least 0.2 miles long, approximately 150 to 100 feet,
trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Victorville
There were no other sightings in Victorville on or around November 11th 2010
